tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Toothastu¬† is a great place to go take care of your teeth. Dr Akash bhandari was very professional examining and providing with solutions by priority. I had to do my front teeth which was pending from quite a long time but the procedure suggested by Dr was very good and I have made my mind to do the front teeth as Dr Akash¬† did a great job, I felt that I was in good hands. ¬†I have been to other dentists that exaggerated what my needs were in order.So it was a relief to find a dentist with integrity.
He has explained very well what was going on. Thanks to Dr Akash 
¬†He provided excellent service and I will be coming here for all my future dental needs !!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My full implant dental treatment is done at Toothastu Dental Specialists. I am truly  satisfied, happy and living healthy life because of new implants ( permanent teeth). Dr Akash has been very helpful and cooperative with overall procedural explanation & had a satisfactory experience. The treatments done here are top notch.

I highly recommend this place for full Implant treatment.

I visited Dr. Akash s bhandari for my wisdom toothextraction. I had done my x-ray of mouth froma local dental clinic and been informed that aprofessional oral surgeon is required to extractmy wisdom tooth as it was very near thenerve. Initially I consulted Dr. Akash s bhandarithrough video call in which I shared my x-raywith him. He clearly explained me about theissue and procedure, and answered all myquestions. During the operation Dr.Akash s bhandari was constantly explaining meabout the procedure which made me feelrelaxed. The overall operation went smoothexcept in the middle of the operation theelectricity in the clinic went off and we had tohold the operation for about 10 minutes.Apart from that everything was fine. Postoperation I got my stitches removed after aweek and everything seems to be fine now.Thanks to Dr. Akash and the team.

I had visited Dr akash for my veneer treatment of the front teeth. His skills are very good and the work was done well . Thnx team toothastu
Had a very satisfactory treatment of my son. He did not complain of any tooth aches after the same. Good job.
Dr Akash is very friendly in nature and he explains the treatment procedures very well unlike the other doctors.

review: Very Friendly. Explains about the treatment & consequences & result in detail. Very calm & polite. Does not let's u wait & visit unnecessarily.
I would recommend everyone to go for implant treatment with Dr Akash. His staff is very friendly and he explained the treatment process very well

I had crooked teeth and was very conscious of my smile. I had to cover my mouth every time I laughed. I'm much more confident now. Dr. and his entire team have been great. I wish I had got my braces sooner.
It's really wonderful to see many doctors working as a team, I did many Root canals and I am very much satisfied with the job now waiting for the crowns.
I had very nice experience with my immediate loading implant here. Would recommend to everyone if having any dental issues to try him once for sure.
I usually have high anxiety during dental visits, but this root canal was a breeze. Thank you again! I highly recommend them.

*Glad to see all care being taken to sanitise
environment for safe treatment. Very
competent dentist/surgeon.*
I got root canal treatment done. Dr & his team provided the best treatment  even during the COViD 19 pandemic,following all safety protocols. Thanks to him and his team .
